attributes.action: Support women in the US who are losing the right to choose to have an abortion
attributes.background: I am a 14 year old girl in the UK and I feel very strongly about the ban of abortion in certain states in the US. I believe that it should be discussed further with opinions from women and not just men. Even though we are in the UK, we should not ignore the issues effecting women in the US.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what "support" you'd like the Government or Parliament to provide.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to respond to the issue you raise. 

If you like, you could sign this petition, which calls on the Government to put pressure on the United States of America to change recent abortion laws: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/261778
